DOC.brief_summary: Demonstrate efficacy High Intensity Focused Ultrasound treatment breast fibroadenoma .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Breast Fibroadenoma With High Intensity Focused Ultrasound ( HIFU )
DOC.criteria: One breast fibroadenoma diagnosis base : Clinical examination Ultrasound image For woman old 35 year : mammogram BIRADS score < 3 Histologic confirmation two independent reader Fibroadenoma size 1 cm 3 cm large dimension ( measure ultrasound ) Patient pregnant lactate BiRADS score > 2 mammogram , microcalcifications within lesion . History breast cancer history laser radiation therapy target breast Breast implant Breast cyst Fibroadenoma clearly visible ultrasound image ( B mode ) Patient participate trial use drug device
